column2:
symbol
  1. p, pp; symbol or abbreviation of صَفْحَہ (ṣafḥah).

character
  1. The thirty-fifth letter of the Urdu alphabet.

name
  1. Aban, the eighth month of the solar Persian calendar.

noun
  1. (literary) sunshine, sunlight, sunbeam
  2. (literary) heat (of the sun)

column2:
noun
  1. ease, simplicity, convenience
  2. an instance of above; an easy thing

noun
  1. sky
  2. (Islamic cosmology) celestial sphere, firmament; one of the seven heavens

adj
  1. sky blue
  2. of or relating to the sky; celestial, heavenly

adj
  1. strongly attached to
  2. fond of, enamoured of, addicted to, devoted to, intent on, engrossed in
  3. zealously following or pursuing

noun
  1. evil spirit, demon, apparition
  2. ill-fortune, calamity
  3. illness, madness
  4. trouble, pain, shock

column2:
noun
  1. monarchy
  2. kingship, reign, royalty, sovereignty; the rank or office of a badshah or padishah
  3. kingdom, dominion, empire, state

noun
  1. (anatomy) arm
  2. (anatomy) wing of a bird, etc.
  3. (military) flank of an army
  4. (figuratively) supporter or companion
  5. side of a framework or a door, doorpost
  6. sleeve of a garment

noun
  1. (idiomatic) immediate family, parents and their children

noun
  1. a kind of earring with pendants
  2. an ear of corn

column2:
verb
  1. (intransitive) to burn, be on fire
  2. (intransitive) to ignite

noun
  1. splendor, luster, glory, effulgence
  2. (rare) the meeting of the bride and bridegroom (in the presence of their relations)
  3. (religious) the ceremony (among Muslims) when the bridegroom reads a chapter of the Qur'ān, and for the first time sees his wife's face in a mirror

noun
  1. community; organisation; group
  2. (Islam) congregational worship (salat)
  3. (religion) congregation (religious, excl. salat)
  4. (politics) political party
  5. (education) year-group, class
  6. (mathematics, set theory) class, sets

verb
  1. to fix
  2. to lay in place
  3. to freeze
  4. to establish
  5. (colloquial) to hit

noun
  1. Friday
  2. (Islam) congregation, Friday prayers at the mosque

adj
  1. heavenly, or pertaining to heaven
  2. paradise dweller
  3. pious, gentle
  4. blessed, divine

noun
  1. (Hinduism) janeu (sacred thread worn by Hindu men)

noun
  1. cord, rope; trace (of a harness)
  2. fastening
  3. yoking
  4. light, brilliance, splendour
  5. a beam or ray of light, the light or flame of a lamp or candle, a halo
  6. a lamp (as placed before an idol)
  7. a glance (of the eye), sight
  8. the soul

noun
  1. risk
  2. hazard
  3. danger
  4. peril
  5. jeopardy
  6. a hazardous undertaking, enterprise, or business
  7. (originally) insurance; secure possession (of property, etc.)
  8. valuables (jewels, money, the thing risked or put to hazard, etc.)

noun
  1. devotee
  2. ascetic, hermit
  3. (colloquial) an itinerant conjurer or snake charmer similar to a gypsy (probably due to the popular association of supernatural or miraculous powers with Sufi monks)

noun
  1. jewel, gem
  2. essence, meaning
  3. atom
  4. (rare) self-immolation on a pyre, especially that done by the Rajput women when facing capture, as men fought the final battle
  5. (rare) a funeral pyre

noun
  1. dreadlocks
  2. (Hinduism) the hair of Shiva, which is matted into dreadlocks, like the hair of a sadhu

  2. (graph theory) the length of the longest path between two vertices on a graph

name
  1. Chittagong (a city in Bangladesh)
  2. (by extension) Chittagong District (a district of Bangladesh)
  3. (by extension) Chittagong Division (a division of Bangladesh)

  1. to climb
  2. to rise, to ascend
  3. to mount
  4. to board

noun
  1. (chiefly) witch
  2. succubus, banshee
  3. (derogatory) hag, ugly old woman

noun
  1. (historical, Hinduism, Buddhism) chakravartin, wheel-turner (in reference to the dharmachakra), world-ruler, upholder of dharma, a title taken by Indian emperors

column2:
adj
  1. smooth, polished; slippery

verb
  1. to be settled
  2. to be paid off, repaid (e.g. a debt)
  3. to be finished, completed
  4. to be astonished, bewildered, surprised, or amazed

name
  1. Chongqing (a direct-administered municipality and city in western China).

noun
  1. escape, deliverance, letting go
  2. freedom, impunity
  3. discount, exemption; concession
  4. separation; divorce
  5. omission, excision

adj
  1. little, small
  2. younger, junior, minor, lesser
  3. subordinate, inferior, common
  4. trivial, trifling, unimportant, of no consequence
